function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Healthcare workers not using personal protective equipment (ppe)","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coronavirus vaccine","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of information technology in solving and reducing organizational or business problems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to preventive measures such as self-isolation and isolation of infected patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to follow who recommendations for avoiding close contact with infected individuals and animals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymptomatic spread of the virus before symptoms appear, leading to undetected transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 has fast spread globally, causing a public health emergency of international concern.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intensified threats and risks associated with pandemic resilience strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close collaboration between different specialists required for calibrating models","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education on indoor air quality iaq in architectural design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Little attention to implementing technology in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration and communication in implementing biofiltration technology in architectural design","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 is increased in indoor environments with relaxed restrictions","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education regarding the importance of ventilation and airflow control in disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of hazard elimination measures for potential exposure to covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of administrative controls for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent compliance with ppe recommendations for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The need for targeted policy changes across public health, urban planning, and architectural design sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large scientific literature on covid-19 and public health interventions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air pollution increasing susceptibility to sars-cov-2 infection.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Densely populated environments increase exposure to pathogens","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective infection control and prevention measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of research and understanding of pandemic viruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spreading of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor airborne transmission of viruses","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High association of covid-19 infection with air pollution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in shared office spaces and co-working changes in physical spaces to mitigate future virus attacks","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on a single antivirus strategy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility and responsiveness in addressing pandemics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient preparation for future pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased density in urban areas leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on telecommuting and digital communication leading to reduced social interaction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the long-term impact of the pandemic and future social effects","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in architecture and urban planning due to fear of infection","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cities being tested during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable development goals focused on human health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased virtual and augmented reality use may lead to prolonged screen time and potential health practices.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible influx of covid-19 patients in temporary hospitals","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelmed healthcare systems and inadequate medical facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decentralization may lead to inefficient distribution of resources and
